CapacitySource.description: A description of the type and source of storage.
CapacitySource.longDescription: This composition may be used to represent the source and type of storage capacity.  At most one of the ProvidingDrives, ProvidingVolumes, ProvidingMemoryChunks, ProvidingMemory or ProvidingPools properties may have a value.  If any of ProvidingDrives, ProvidingVolumes, ProvidingMemory or ProvidingPools reference more than one resource, allocation of capacity across those resources is implementation dependent.

^([a-zA-Z_][a-zA-Z0-9_]*)?@(odata|Redfis.description: This property shall specify a valid odata or Redfish property.

Oem.longDescription: This property shall contain the OEM extensions.  All values for properties that this object contains shall conform to the Redfish Specification-described requirements.

ProvidedCapacity.description: The amount of space that has been provided from the ProvidingDrives, ProvidingVolumes, ProvidingMemory or ProvidingPools.
ProvidedCapacity.longDescription: The value shall be the amount of space that has been provided from the ProvidingDrives, ProvidingVolumes, ProvidingMemory or ProvidingPools.

ProvidedClassOfService.description: The ClassOfService provided from the ProvidingDrives, ProvidingVolumes, ProvidingMemoryChunks, ProvidingMemory or ProvidingPools.
ProvidedClassOfService.longDescription: The value shall reference the provided ClassOfService from the ProvidingDrives, ProvidingVolumes, ProvidingMemoryChunks, ProvidingMemory or ProvidingPools.

ProvidingDrives.description: The drive or drives that provide this space.
ProvidingDrives.longDescription: If present, the value shall be a reference to a contributing drive or drives.

ProvidingPools.description: The pool or pools that provide this space.
ProvidingPools.longDescription: If present, the value shall be a reference to a contributing storage pool or storage pools.

ProvidingVolumes.description: The volume or volumes that provide this space.
ProvidingVolumes.longDescription: If present, the value shall be a reference to a contributing volume or volumes.

title: #Capacity.v1_0_1.CapacitySource
